rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
饮食失调中的电解质异常与全因死亡风险较高相关《柳叶刀精神病学》发表的一项新研究发现，32% 的饮食失调患者电解质水平异常，这与任何原因导致的死亡风险较高有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Electrolyte-abnormalities-in-eating-disorders-linked-with-higher-risk-of-death-from-any-cause.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Electrolyte-abnormalities-in-eating-disorders-linked-with-higher-risk-of-death-from-any-cause.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85b7717e-ea3b-485a-852d-bf22b2854ccc Wed, 18 Sep 2024 21:13:52 -0400 Electrolyte abnormalities in eating disorders associated with higher risk of death from any cause
研究表明 MIND 饮食可以降低认知能力下降的风险根据美国神经病学学会医学杂志《Neurology》2024 年 9 月 18 日在线期刊上发表的一项研究，饮食与 MIND 饮食更接近的人可能有较低的认知障碍风险。黑人和白人参与者的结果相似。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/MIND-diet-may-reduce-cognitive-decline-risk-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/MIND-diet-may-reduce-cognitive-decline-risk-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e49fefc-a7e4-4fc1-8c28-2ee03cbe0515 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 20:58:16 -0400 MIND diet may reduce cognitive decline risk, study suggests
新的荟萃分析将老年人头晕与跌倒风险增加联系起来此类首个荟萃分析表明，老年人出现阵发性头晕与跌倒风险显着升高之间存在确实的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/New-meta-analysis-links-dizziness-in-older-adults-to-increased-fall-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/New-meta-analysis-links-dizziness-in-older-adults-to-increased-fall-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96b50c07-ecc7-4bf9-a228-fe179afa9da1 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 20:53:22 -0400 New meta-analysis links dizziness in older adults to increased fall risk
临床试验发现泊马度胺可有效治疗罕见出血性疾病美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 支持的一项临床试验因研究人员发现足够的证据表明用于治疗骨髓癌和卡波西肉瘤的药物对于治疗遗传性出血性毛细血管扩张症 (HHT)（一种罕见的出血性疾病）是安全有效的而提前停止。全球每 5,000 人中就有 1 人受到影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Clinical-trial-finds-pomalidomide- effective-for-treating-rare-bleeding-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Clinical-trial-finds-pomalidomide- effective-for-treating-rare-bleeding-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=688c671e-1b55-43dd-8abb-ebadbb8f73d6 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 20:45:26 -0400 Clinical trial finds pomalidomide effective for treating rare bleeding disorder
研究表明糖尿病药物可降低痴呆和帕金森病的风险根据美国神经病学学会医学杂志《神经病学》在线期刊 2024 年 9 月 18 日发表的一项研究，一类治疗糖尿病的药物可能与降低患痴呆症和帕金森病的风险有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Study-links-diabetes-drugs-to-lower-risk-of-dementia-and-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Study-links-diabetes-drugs-to-lower-risk-of-dementia-and-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3663b3ca-3d44-4fc0-a203-45095d948765 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 20:41:51 -0400 Study links diabetes drugs to lower risk of dementia and Parkinson's disease
研究可能代表一种可能的非手术治疗白内障策略美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 的研究人员及其合作者发现了一种名为 RNF114 的蛋白质，它可以逆转白内障，即随着年龄增长，人们常见的晶状体混浊现象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Study-may-represent-a-possible-surgery-free-strategy-for-managing-cataracts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Study-may-represent-a-possible-surgery-free-strategy-for-managing-cataracts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb86fa2b-35de-42fb-9fd8-2c6329548f9f Wed, 18 Sep 2024 20:31:57 -0400 Study may represent a possible surgery-free strategy for managing cataracts
科学家查明了数千种与乳腺癌和卵巢癌风险相关的基因变异科学家们已经查明了一个基因中的数千个遗传变化，这些变化可能会增加一个人患乳腺癌和卵巢癌的风险，从而为更好的风险评估和更个性化的护理铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Scientists-pinpoint-thousands-of-gene-variants-linked-to-breast-and-ovarian-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Scientists-pinpoint-thousands-of-gene-variants-linked-to-breast-and-ovarian-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6a8307b-f058-4247-983a-8ab3545b187d Wed, 18 Sep 2024 20:25:42 -0400 Scientists pinpoint thousands of gene variants linked to breast and ovarian cancer risk
语音分析手机应用程序可以识别肝性脑病的早期症状密歇根大学的研究表明，有一天，一款手机应用程序只需听患者说话即可检测出患者肝性脑病的发展情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Speech-analysis-phone-app-could-identify-early-signs-of-hepatic-encephalopathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Speech-analysis-phone-app-could-identify-early-signs-of-hepatic-encephalopathy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32f2adf1-178c-4ecf-84d9-a53703c16ee4 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 20:15:26 -0400 Speech analysis phone app could identify early signs of hepatic encephalopathy
研究探讨小胶质细胞对慢性低钠血症的反应和快速钠校正血液中低血清钠浓度称为低钠血症，是一种临床常见的电解质紊乱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Study-explores-microglial-response-to-chronic-hyponatremia-and-rapid-sodium- Correction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Study-explores-microglial-response-to-chronic-hyponatremia-and-rapid-sodium- Correction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24625f46-5832-4f87-b033-c0be8d7b1c71 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 20:11:28 -0400 Study explores microglial response to chronic hyponatremia and rapid sodium correction
更新的营养评分系统揭示了不良饮食与心血管疾病风险之间更紧密的联系欧洲的一项大型研究发现，食用根据更新的营养评分分级的营养质量较低的食物会增加患心血管疾病的风险，特别是中风和心脏病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Updated-Nutri-Score-system-reveals-stronger-links- Between-poor-diet-and-cardioangio-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240918/Updated-Nutri-Score-system-reveals-stronger-links- Between-poor-diet-and-cardioangio-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06878c02-74c3-440e-a90c-82ed51f66ba3 Wed, 18 Sep 2024 20:07:00 -0400 Updated Nutri-Score system reveals stronger links between poor diet and cardiovascular disease risk
